name: The Bad Guy
description:
The Bad Guy was made in 24 hours at a Nicoteam private jam (june 2018).

Run for your life collecting books on Universal Declaration Of Human Rights. You can't avoid being shot.

The Bad Guy is our tribute to the Atari 2600 classic game "Keystone Kapers".

A / left arrow key
go left
D / right arrow key
go right
space / up arrow key
jump
